channel.title: Which host do you use? Post your preferred Webhost\VPS\Dedicated Host
channel.description:
I use a Dedicated server from http://Rackspace.com & Http://Esecuredata.com (I have 2 for a Runescape Classic & a Runescape 2 Server)
Although, if I was to get DDOS attacks I'd go with http://staminus.net
for my web host, I use http://site5.com using a Singapore server.
Which host do you guys use & or prefer?

@vyre-scape wrote:

I use myhosting for the VPS and hostgator for webhost

item.title: Which host do you use? Post your preferred Webhost\VPS\Dedicated Host
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:12, topic:418254”][quote author=Doobage link=topic=520800.msg3898603#msg3898603 date=1327545062]
x10hosting is what i use

BUT they do check ur files so if they find anything that has any copyright material on it, like if u upload ur client files to it, they will shut it down and ban your account, wont let u delete them either, just lock and ban

And if u dont log into forums ull get suspended.
[/quote]

That sounds like a horrible host. A good host would never look at your files.

I use Gigenet out of Chicago, USA for the dedicated server I run everything on.[/quote]

Very true, they shouldn’t be but they try their best to remove piracy and phishing scams, so they tend to look through your webhost to make sure your being a good boy/girl.

I was mad cause i paid for premium services, and I forgot my client files in a .zip in the server which WASN’T even accessible, but they banned me for it.

Personally, id recommend x90x.net they are offshore and they dont browse your files, but they will take u down if you have any phishing scam sites on your webhost

Read full topic

item.title: Which host do you use? Post your preferred Webhost\VPS\Dedicated Host
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

mmshadow808:

after my server went down due to ddosers. I had about 900 players+

And I am your real father.
If you had 900+ online, you would be making enough of an income to buy a firewall.

Read full topic
item.source: Which host do you use? Post your preferred Webhost\VPS\Dedicated Host

item.title: Which host do you use? Post your preferred Webhost\VPS\Dedicated Host
item.dc:creator: @mmshadow808 mmshadow808
item.description:
@mmshadow808 wrote:

cdoggy:

A dedicated server is pointless. RSPS’s, if configured correctly for linux, use almost no ram, aside from what you allocate. Why not just get a xen vps and save say… $100-$139 a month? The only time a dedicated server would be needed is if you got like over 200 players… and even then you could simply have 2 worlds on two vps’s or a large Xen VPS.

The amount of Ram is a key factor in a private server. When you have a small server with about 30 people on the computer needs to be able to support those 30 players in writing new data ect… Which is why for a server with 400+ People would require 8g’s + of ram. But yes Linux is very good for Rsps… Too bad i didn’t learn how to use it until after my server went down due to ddosers. I had about 900 players+

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Anc13ntsIsBack, post:3, topic:418254”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=520800.msg3783677#msg3783677 date=1318689056]
Lol…

Starting at only $159 per month!
[/quote]

Eh, it’s not bad for what they offer actually[/quote]

I wouldn’t doubt it, but who’s pulling off $159 a month from a RSPS? (Besides those Near reality-like rsps’s) You’d need 32 $5 donators every 4 weeks, and you’d get $1 extra. That’s just the VPS… o.o
